data.name: Firefall - "Rocketeer" Premium Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take to the skies with the Rocketeer Premium Pack! This pack includes:

Rocketeer’s Wings

• Fly the friendly skies and arrive at your destination quickly with this sexy new glider.
• Also great for abandoning your friends in battle and saving your own hide!

25 Security Keys

• Use the key to open various security caches in the game for ultimate rewards.
• May the epic and legendary quality be with you!

30 days of VIP

• +25% Earned Crystite
• +25% Earned XP
• +25% Earned Reputation Vouchers
• +2 Crafting Workbench Slots
• +8 Market Slots
• Access to the VIP Boosted Glider Pad

100 Red Beans

• Currency used to purchase additional in-game items and perks.
• “I’d buy THAT for 100 Red Beans!” – Random Bandit

Exclusive Title “Rocketeer”

• Exclusive in-game title for this digital package.
• This son of a brontodon WILL fly!

data.short_description: Soar to new heights and get to your destination in blazing speed with the Rocketeer Premium Pack! This bundle includes the Rocketeer’s Wings glider, 25 Security Keys, 30 Days of VIP, 100 Red Beans, and an Exclusive Title, “Rocketeer.”
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3
  • Processor:AMD Dual Core @ 2.6GHz; Intel Dual Core @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia 8600 or ATI 4xxx with 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
